column2: NOTWITHSTANDING Mr. Craig's prophecy, the dark-blue cloud dispersed itself without having produced the threatened consequences.
column3: NOTWITHSTANDING mr Craig's prophecy, the dark blue cloud dispersed itself without having produced the threatened consequences.

column2: But it was Adam's strength, not its correlative hardness, that influenced his meditations this morning.
column3: But it was Adam's strength, not its correlative hardness, that influenced his meditations this morning.
